info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 27 at 4:43PM MST until July 27 at 6:15PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHWESTERN MOHAVE COUNTY... At 443 PM MST, Doppler radar indicates heavy rain has ended across the warned area however, flooded road concerns continue with numerous road closures being reported in Golden Valley. HAZARD...Flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations in the warning area include... Chloride, Golden Valley, Windy Point Campground, Packsaddle Campground and Dolan Springs. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
